"@Gizoid101":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5411203a63687205bedb0100#post_5411203a63687205bedb0100
Being able to cheat in school. 

"Alrighty kids, your ready for the end of the year test!"

"Yeeeees...."

Me: "You bet your ass I am"

"Alright, on your marks, get set, GO!"

Me: "THE WORLD!"

"What was th-"

*Takes the answer sheet off the shelf and writes all the right answers*

*Time returnes*

"I was saying I was Done!"
